title: Arcane Lock
content:
Arcane Lock Level 2 Abjuration Spell Close a door or container with a magical lock. It can no longer be lockpicked or opened with Knock. 10 turns Melee Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Abjuration Spell

Close a door or container with a magical lock. It can no longer be lockpicked or opened with Knock.

Arcane Lock is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Arcane Lock is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or
